name: TheTomWoodsShow
0:
”Alexa, open the Tom Woods Show”
”Are there any episodes with Scott Horton?”
”Play episode one thousand”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the tom woods show
des:
Join New York Times bestselling author Tom Woods for your daily serving of liberty education! Guests include Ron Paul, Judge Andrew Napolitano, David Stockman, and hundreds more, with topics like war, the Federal Reserve, net neutrality, the FDA, Austrian economics, and many other subjects of interest to libertarians.

To get started, enable the skill and ask Alexa to "open the Tom Woods Show". Next, you can ask Alexa to play the latest episode, pick a particular episode by number, ask Alexa to play an episode featuring a guest that you liked, or ask for details about an episode. You may also ask for information about the host, or play all episodes featuring a specified guest in a playlist.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
